country_select.description: Your country selection will ensure that we offer the correct products and payment methods. Please ensure that it corresponds to your country and the account(s) on which you are planning to redeem the product.
country_select.title: Select your country

error.description: Whoops! This is embarrassing, we can't find this page right now. Can you please try again later?
error.error_text: It looks like the page you would like to see no longer exists, sorry
error.help: Please click on the button bellow to return to the homepage or select your country from top menu.
error.title: Page not found

footer.quote: Rapido.com is part of CG | Millions of satisfied customers |

general.critical_error: Something went wrong. Reload the page to try again.
general.label: Rapido
general.look-at-faqs: Take a look at the FAQ's

payment-methods.checkout-options: On Rapido.com, you can checkout with the following trusted payment options. Each payment option will be described below.
payment-methods.paypal_text_1: You can pay with PayPal on Rapido.com. After selecting this payment option, you log into your PayPal account and confirm the payment. Next, the transaction is processed.
payment-methods.paypal_text_2: Upon receipt of payment, the top up voucher code is sent immediately.
payment-methods.visa_and_mastercard_text_1: On Rapido.com, you can pay via VISA credit card, VISA debit card (Delta and Electron) and MasterCard. At the checkout, you select payment by credit card. Then you enter your credit card details, including the card holder, the card number, expiration date and CVV code. Then confirm payment.
payment-methods.visa_and_mastercard_text_2: Upon receipt of payment, the top up code is sent immediately.

account.account-created: You’ve successfully created a Rapido account
account.agree-to-terms: By creating an account, you agree with Rapido’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
account.change-email-requested: We have sent you an email to confirm the change of your email address
account.check-your-email: Check your email. We just sent you instructions for resetting your password. If you do not recive an email in 30 minutes. please try again.

account.description-birthdate: Please enter your date of birth

footer.need-help: Do you need help? Check out our frequently asked questions.

login.title: Log In
login.unconfirmed_email: The email address is not confirmed
login.unknown_user: The email address does not have an account.

account.name: Name

orders.description-inprogress: Is your order still not delivered after 12 hours? Please contact us and we'll help you out!

account.please-enter-password-for-confirmation: Please enter your password for confirmation
account.quick-signin: We can get you signed back in to your account in no time.

request_change_email.invalid: This email address is already in use.

request_reset_password.unknown_user: No account found for this email address.

invalid.message: Please use a valid reset link to change your password.
invalid.title: Invalid

reset_password.invalid_token: The reset password link has expired. Please fill in the forgot password form.

submit.message: Your password is now updated and you're logged in.
submit.title: Password changed

account.retry-reset: I've used a wrong email address. I want to try again
account.try-again: Wrong email address? Create a new account here
account.validation-send: To verify your Rapido account, please use the link in the account validation email we’ve just sent to {email}. See you soon!
account.where-youre-logged-in: Devices you’ve used to log in to your account
account.your-account-is-confirmed: Your account with the email address {email} is verified. You can now log in to your account.
account.your-email-is-changed: Your email address has been updated to {email}. You can now login into your account.
